channel.title: Posts on Ryan Morrison, PhD, PE
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ryan Morrison, PhD, PE

item.title: Italian Collaborator at CSU
item.description: Antonio Annis, a longtime collaborator from the University for Foreigners of Perugia, visited CSU to present our research at the 9th International Congress on Environmental Modelling and Software. It was a pleasure to meet Antonio after 2.5 years of collaboration!

item.title: Kara Scheel Graduates!
item.description: Congrats to Kara Scheel for successfully passing her M.S. defense and graduating in May, 2018! Kara’s thesis was titled, “Toward Understanding Changes in Large-Scale Floodplain Connectivity Caused by Levees”, and is currently in review with the Journal of American Water Resources Association.
